item.title: Department of Defense Transition Assistance Program Oversight Improvement Act of 2018

latestAction.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

item.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

summary.text:
Department of Defense Transition Assistance Program Oversight Improvement Act of 2017

This bill directs the Department of Defense to report to Congress annually on the participation of members of the Armed Forces in the Transition Assistance Program during the preceding year.

bill.title: Department of Defense Transition Assistance Program Oversight Improvement Act of 2017

item.title: Department of Defense Transition Assistance Program Oversight Improvement Act of 2017
Department of Defense Transition Assistance Program Oversight Improvement Act of 2017
A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to require an annual report on participation in the Transition Assistance Program for members of the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.

latestAction.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
